purpose: Expose a richer, PROCESS-like component CAPEX breakdown as a transparent algebraic overlay. This is not a bankable cost model; it is for relative comparisons and feasibility screening with explicit caps.
validity_domain: Relative proxy economics only; intended for design-space exploration and feasibility governance. Not suitable for investment decisions or licensing financial claims.
notes: TF vs PF/CS split is governed by cost_k_tf and cost_k_pf as a deterministic share. Magnitude follows the legacy magnet proxy.
Heating/CD CAPEX proxy scales with launched auxiliary/CD power (P_CD_launch_MW or fallback Paux_MW).
Tritium plant CAPEX proxy scales with tritium throughput (T_burn_kg_per_day) when available; otherwise returns 0 for that component.
